page.title: 14ASCOT DAY CENTRE
page.content: Ascot day centre is a place where old people can come and spend their day.It opens at 10a.m. and closes at 4.30p.m. In the morning the old people have coffee and bicuits followed by a cooked lunch at lunchtime and tea and cakes in the afternoon.Haircuts are cheaply obtained at the centre.Special occasions are celebrated with the help of the brownies who come into help.At the moment the centre comprises 2 terr -apins joined together but a new cetre built of brick is just starting to be built.The old centre held 80 people but the new one will hold 100 people. There is a nice garden attached to the centre which will be kept and the open space to the rear of the centre will continue to be used as allotments.
